availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Nelson Stephens (Boone County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace.)

body.p: Boone County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Boone County, Kentucky, native. Son of James Nelson Stephens and Louisa H. Stephens. Married to Louisiana Stephens. Father of Pamela Stephens and Sydney Stephens. Farmer in Boone County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Boone County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Boone County in 1861. Farmer in Boone County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, District 1, p. 22.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Union, p. 396.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Carelton, p. 177B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Boone County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 418.
"Thomas Nelson Stephens (1833-1910)," Find A Grave, Memorial #13908452, accessed June 29, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/13908452/thomas-nelson-stephens.
